definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to hold/to seize/to catch/to apprehend/to take/(used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
